summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE LOCAL NALLEY LEXUS SMYRNA DEALER WAS CONTACTED AT 888-501-2233 LOCATED ON 2750 COBB PKWY SE. SMYRNA GA, 30080 WHERE SHE WAS INFORMED THAT PARTS WOULD NOT BE MADE AVAILABLE UNTIL SOMETIME IN SEPTEMBER AND SHE WOULD HAVE TO CALL BACK IN SEPTEMBER IN ORDER TO BE PLACED ON A WAITING LIST. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
